sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="CSC Service Request">be15a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961928</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:b215a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961941</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default from Requested For</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Default values
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-780 20-Sept-2018  Mathew Kuriakose   Set Req for Organization
 *
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	
	//Get value from script include
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid',  newValue);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);
	function cbFtn(answer) {
		if (answer) {
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);

	
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company, retObj.company);
			
			
					
		}
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-20 19:28:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cf15a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961980</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default from Requested For</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cf15a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961980</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-21 00:27:09</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="CSC Service Request">be15a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961928</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Make Requested for Read Only</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Helper Functions for Service Request Project
 * 
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-366 16-August-2018 Mathew Kuriakose   Initial implementation 
 * Copyright to BC Public Service - Service Request
 */

function onLoad() {
	
var CheckIsMemberOfObj = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_CatalogHelper');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.addParam('sysparm_name', 'AssignGroup');
CheckIsMemberOfObj.getXML(script_response);
 
function script_response(response) {
	
var script_answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
if(script_answer == 'true')
{
    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', false);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', false);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', false);
}

else{

    g_form.setReadOnly('u_requested_for', true);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_department', true);
	//g_form.setReadOnly('u_office', true);

}
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-20 19:28:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4315a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961987</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make Requested for Read Only</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4315a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961987</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-20 19:28:02</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_c315a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961984
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="CSC Service Request">be15a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961928</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default Values From Current User</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Default values using the current logged-In User
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-203 10-Jun-2018  James Jose      Initial implementation
 * SB-662 28-Aug-2018  Munhwan Gim     Use Phone number not User name for sc_item_request_display_name
 *
 **/
function onLoad() {
	
	//Set organization based on the user
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	//Get value from script include at the server side
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid', userID);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);
	
	function cbFtn(answer) {
		if (answer) {
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
			
			//Set short description of task
			//var sc_item_request_display_name = 'Reset Voice Mail Password for ' + retObj.username;  
			//g_form.setValue('sc_item_request_display_name', sc_item_request_display_name, sc_item_request_display_name);
			//Set Requested for organization
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company, retObj.company);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-20 19:28:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c315a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961984</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default Values From Current User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c315a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961984</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-21 00:13:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item.category=083d7910dba86740fe199236db96190c^EQ<item display_table="sc_category" display_value="OCIO Internal Request" endquery="false" field="cat_item.category" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="083d7910dba86740fe199236db96190c"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR copy attachment-RITM</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

//copy attachment from Call record to request item
var callRec = new GlideRecord('new_call');
			  callRec.addQuery('transferred_to',current.request);					
			  callRec.query();
			  if(callRec.next()) {
var sourceSysID =callRec.sys_id+'';
var targetSysID = current.sys_id+'';
			
var copyAtt = new GlideSysAttachment();			
copyAtt.copy('new_call',sourceSysID,'sc_req_item',targetSysID);
	
			  }

	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-21 00:44:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>152deee7dba8ab4050479eb6db9619ef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>42</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR copy attachment-RITM</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_152deee7dba8ab4050479eb6db9619ef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-01 01:43:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=152deee7dba8ab4050479eb6db9619ef"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="CSC Service Request">be15a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961928</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Get Call record data on load</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {


var call_record = getParmVal('sysparm_call_record');
var ga = new GlideAjax("OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details");
ga.addParam("sysparm_name","call_info");
ga.addParam("sysparam_CallRecord",call_record);
ga.getXML(ajaxResponse);	
  
}

function getParmVal(name){
    var url = document.URL.parseQuery();
    if(url[name]){
        return decodeURI(url[name]);
    }
    else{
        return;
    }
}	

	function ajaxResponse(serverResponse) {
	var result = serverResponse.responseXML.getElementsByTagName("result");
	var call_req_for = result[0].getAttribute("call_req_for");
	var call_req_by = result[0].getAttribute("call_req_by");
	var call_short_desc=result[0].getAttribute("call_short_desc");
	var call_im_req_for= result[0].getAttribute("call_im_req_for");
		
		
	g_form.setValue('u_requested_for',call_req_for);
	g_form.setValue('Short_Description',call_short_desc);
	g_form.setValue('u_requested_by',call_req_by);
	g_form.setValue('u_organization_im',call_im_req_for);

	}
	
   
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-20 21:05:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f44b75e7db28ab4050479eb6db96193a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Call record data on load</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f44b75e7db28ab4050479eb6db96193a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 00:36:08</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_acb78223db68ab4050479eb6db9619b5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details</name><script><![CDATA[var OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details = Class.create();
OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
//Populate Call record details to the catalog for New calls. Its called by Client scripts from 
	
	   call_info: function() {
		var CallRecord = this.getParameter('sysparam_CallRecord');
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		var call_details = new GlideRecord('new_call');
		call_details.addQuery('sys_id',CallRecord);
		call_details.query();
		if(call_details.next())
			{
			    result.setAttribute("call_short_desc",call_details.short_description);
			    result.setAttribute("call_req_for", call_details.u_requested_for);
				result.setAttribute("call_req_by", call_details.caller);
				result.setAttribute("call_im_req_for", call_details.company.name);
				result.setAttribute("call_description", call_details.description);


				
			}
	},

	
    type: 'OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-20 22:00:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>acb78223db68ab4050479eb6db9619b5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO_SR_Call_Record_Details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_acb78223db68ab4050479eb6db9619b5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-01 00:02:03</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_task">request_item.cat_item.category=083d7910dba86740fe199236db96190c^EQ<item display_table="sc_category" display_value="OCIO Internal Request" endquery="false" field="request_item.cat_item.category" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="083d7910dba86740fe199236db96190c"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>OCIO SR Call Details-SCTASK</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

//copy attachment from RITM record to sc task
//copy Description from RITM record to sc task
//copy CI field from Call record to sc task



var RitmRec = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
			  RitmRec.addQuery('sys_id',current.request_item);					
			  RitmRec.query();
			  if(RitmRec.next()) {
var sourceSysID =RitmRec.sys_id+'';
var targetSysID = current.sys_id+'';
				  
current.description=RitmRec.variables.Description;	

var copyAtt = new GlideSysAttachment();			
copyAtt.copy('sc_req_item',sourceSysID,'sc_task',targetSysID);
				  
			  }

var CallRec = new GlideRecord('new_call');
			  CallRec.addQuery('transferred_to',current.request_item.request);					
			  CallRec.query();
			  if(CallRec.next()) {
current.cmdb_ci= CallRec.u_cmdb_ci;
			  }
	
	
current.update();
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-21 04:13:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>127d9767db2cab4050479eb6db9619b2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIO SR Call Details-SCTASK</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_127d9767db2cab4050479eb6db9619b2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-03 00:50:46</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=127d9767db2cab4050479eb6db9619b2"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="CSC Service Request">be15a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961928</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:cb15a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db961963</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Phone Number</name><order>300</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   var old_value_store =newValue;
   var phoneno = /^\(?([0-9]{3})\)?[-. ]?([0-9]{3})[-. ]?([0-9]{4})$/;
   newValue = newValue.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '');
   var digits = newValue.length;
   if (newValue.match(phoneno))
 {
 var code = '';
 
 var area = newValue.substring(0,3);
 var prefix = newValue.substring(3,6);
 var line = newValue.substring(6);
var updated_phone = '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line;
if(old_value_store!=updated_phone){
	
 g_form.setValue('u_phone_number', '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line);
 g_form.hideFieldMsg("u_phone_number");	 

	}
 }	
else
 {
 //alert("Please enter 10 digit phone number.");
 g_form.setValue('u_phone_number', oldValue);
//	  g_form.setValue('u_phone_number', "Please enter 10 digit phone number.");
 g_form.showFieldMsg("u_phone_number", "Please enter 10 digit phone number.", "error");
return false;
 }
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-20 19:28:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4315a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db96198a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Phone Number</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4315a52bdbe4ab4050479eb6db96198a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-20 20:34:37</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_01175810eb100100fcfb858ad106fee3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access/><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>new_call</collection><condition>current.call_type.changesTo('sc_request') && current.transferred_to.nil()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CallTypeChanged to Request</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var reqFor = current.u_requested_for;
var contactType = current.contact_type;
var location = current.caller.location;
var reqItem = current.request_item;
var comments = "NEW_CALL_REF:" + current.sys_id + " " + current.description;
var call_record=current.sys_id;
getCart();

var url = "com.glideapp.servicecatalog_cat_item_view.do?sysparm_id=" + reqItem 
	+ "&sysparm_requested_for=" + GlideStringUtil.urlEncode(reqFor) 
	+ "&sysparm_location=" + GlideStringUtil.urlEncode(location) 
	+ "&sysparm_special_instructions=" + GlideStringUtil.urlEncode(comments)
	+ "&sysparm_stack=" + current.getLink()
	+ "&sysparm_contact_type=" + contactType
    + "&sysparm_call_record=" + call_record;
action.setRedirectURL(url);

function getCart() {
	var cart = new GlideRecord('sc_cart');
	var userid = gs.getUserID();
	cart.addQuery('user', userid);
	cart.query();
	if (cart.next()) {
		// We already have a cart so override the requested for value and empty it
		cart.requested_for = reqFor;
		cart.contact_type = contactType;
		cart.special_instructions = comments;
		cart.delivery_address = getDeliveryAddress();
		cart.update();
		var cartItems = new GlideRecord('sc_cart_item');
		cartItems.addQuery('cart', cart.sys_id);
		cartItems.deleteMultiple();
	} else {
		cart.initialize();
		cart.user = userid;
		cart.requested_for = reqFor;
		cart.contact_type = contactType;
		cart.special_instructions = comments;
		cart.delivery_address = getDeliveryAddress();
		cart.insert();
	}
	return cart;
}

function getDeliveryAddress() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('cmn_location');
	if (!gr.get(location))
		return '';
	
	var text = '';
	if (!gr.street.nil())
		text = gr.street + '\n';
	if (!gr.city.nil() && !gr.state.nil() && !gr.zip.nil())
		text += gr.city + ", " + gr.state + ", " + gr.zip;
	return text;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sn.dev</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-03-19 15:25:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>01175810eb100100fcfb858ad106fee3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CallTypeChanged to Request</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Service Desk Call" source="com.snc.service_desk_call">a461e979db1913000f819274db96193e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_01175810eb100100fcfb858ad106fee3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>MKURIAKOSE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-20 21:34:40</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=01175810eb100100fcfb858ad106fee3"/></record_update>
